title: An unexpected query
author: VD
content_html: Okay, try not to die laughing, everyone. Especially you, Nate. As it happens, it would appear I need to consider buying a riding mower. John Deere X304 or MTD Yard Man 42-inch? Normally, I’d go for the former on the basis of JD quality, but I’ve heard that there have been issues of late and I can probably get better service from the MTD dealer.
content_text: Okay, try not to die laughing, everyone.  Especially you, Nate.  As it happens, it would appear I need to consider buying a riding mower.  John Deere X304 or MTD Yard Man 42-inch?  Normally, I’d go for the former on the basis of JD quality, but I’ve heard that there have been issues of late and I can probably get better service from the MTD dealer.
